meanings.sent1: The padauk stands tall in the warm forest.
meanings.sent2: Many exotic birds find shelter in the branches of the padauk.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys love to swing from the sturdy padauk trees.
meanings.sent4: In the jungle, the padauk is like a beacon of strength and beauty.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red bark of the padauk tree catches the eye of all who pass by.

meanings.definition: The reddish-brown wood of the padauk tree.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carve intricate designs into padauk wood.
meanings.sent2: The furniture made from padauk is both durable and elegant.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of freshly cut padauk wood fills the workshop.
meanings.sent4: The rich color of padauk wood adds warmth to any room.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of padauk wood is a delight to touch.
